What I like about the game that it changes you how think about games and how it works. What I dislike about the game that it has a lot of updates that don't really need in the game but that is my opinion on the game.

CSGO is a game that is extremely competitive, and can be very addicting. It takes a lot of hours to get the basics of the game down, and really have some sort of clue what you are doing. I've had the game since 2015 and nothing compares to the competitiveness of CSGO. There is countless amount of support for competitive play, and an entire market based off of the in game skin system. This game isn't for you if your looking for something easy, but I would definitely recommend if your looking for something to put time into, and get better at. However, there are a lot of downfalls to the game. The developers don't listen as much to the players as hoped, and don't fix a lot of the long time problems people complain about the game. The basics of the game are very solid, but it is definitely rough around the edges.
